title: chaturdasa bhuvana roopa
sahitya:
Shree Viswanatham bhajeham
Chatur dasa bhuvana roopa ragamalika bharana dharanaantha karanam

1

Sritha jana samsaarabhi tyaapaham
pa;; ma; ga ri; sa dha; pa ma ga ri ma ma bhithyaapaham
Aadhyaamikaadhi taapathraya manobhithyaapaham

2

Sri Visaalakshi gowrisam
sa ri ga ri; sa ri ma; pa SA ni RI SA; dha pa ma ga ri gowrisam
Sakala nishkala roopa Satchidhanandha maya gowrisam

3

Chitra viswa naaTTaka prakasam
pa ma; ni pa; SA ni RI; SA ni pa RI RI; SA; ni pa; ma ri prakaasam
Jagath prakaasaka Bhaskara Shashaankha koti koti Prakaasam

4

Govindhaadhi vinutha gowLaankam
pa; ni pa; ni; SA pa; ni; SA; SA RI GA MA RI SA; SA; ni pa gowLaankam
Ksheera kundhendhu karpooraadhi Vijaya basithodh dhoolitha gowLaankam

5

Guruguha sammOhana kara Lingam
pa; ga; dha dha pa; dha RI SA; GA; RI; SA pa; dha; ga MOHANA kara
lingam
Panchekritha pancha maha bootha prapanchaadhi MOHANA kara Lingam

6

Virinchi Vishnu Rudhra moorthy mayam (mOhanam)
Vishaya panchakara hitha mabhayam (gowLai)
Nirathishaya sukhatha nipuna tharam (naaTTai)
Nigama saara meeshwara mamaram (gowri)
Smaraharam parama Sivamathulam (aarabi)
Sarasa sadhaya hruthaya nilayamanisham (shree)

7

Sadaa Sivam saama gaana vinutham
pa ma; dha dha SA; dha pa pa saama gaana vinutham
Prakruthyaadhi saptha roopa saama gaana vinutham

8

Sanmaargam lalita hrudhaya vidhitham
dha; ma; ga; ri; sa rahitha lalita hrudhaya vidhitham
Kama krodhaadhi rahitha lalita hrudhaya vidhitham

9

Chitaakaasha bhairavam puraharam
pa ma dha pa; ma ma ga; ri sa ri bhairavam puraharam
Vidhi Kapaala thrisoola dhara bhairavam puraharam

10

Chith Sabesam saaranga dharam
dha; pa ma; pa ma dha pa SA ni RI SA ni saaranga dharam
Dhaarukaavana thapodhana kalpitha saaranga dharam

11

Sadhaasrayaami shankaraabharaNam
sa; ri ga; ma pa dha ni SA RI ni; SA dha pa ma; ga; ri maya
shankaraabharaNam
Chinthitaartha virharana dhureenadhara maanikhya maya
shankaraabharaNam

12

Sathgathi daayakaambhOji charanam
dha; ma; pa; ma ni dha pa dha RI SA ni; pa dha ga ri; sa tharaambhoja charanam
Dharmarthadhi nikila purushaartha pradha samastha tharambhoja
charanam

13

Vadhaanya dEvakriya khelanam
SA; SA; dha pa SA dha pa dha pa; ma; ri; pa ma dha pa dha SA dha pa ma ri sa khelanam
Srishti sthithi vilayathi rodhaanaanugraha karanakriya khelanam

14

Vaidhyalinga bhoopaaLa paalanam
sa ri ga pa ga dha pa SA dha; dha GA; RI SA; dha; pa ga ri sa
bhoopaaLa paalanam
Shri pura nirruthi bhaaga gartha dheerasthira vara bhoopaaLa paalanam

15

Guruguhesha sura naresam anisham (bhoopaaLam)
Guja budhaadhigraha gathi vidhitham (dEvakriya)
Varadhamanala Ravi Sashi nayanam (kaambhOji)
Vanaja Chandra sannibha vadhanam (shankaraabharaNam)
Paramahamsam aanada nardhanam (saaranga)
Pathitha paavanakaranam madha haranam (bhairavam)
Paratharam parama mano laya jayam (lalitaa)
Paraadhivaak Prakaasanandhamayam (saamaa)

Virinci (as before, backwards or volOma)
